usage.cn: 生命是短暂的，活出它。真爱是稀有的，抓住它。愤怒是有害的，放下它。恐惧是可怕的，面对它。回忆是甜美的，珍惜它。
usage.eng: Life is short, live it.Love is rare, grab it.Anger is bad, dump it.Fear is awful, face it.Memories are sweet, cherish it.

usage.cn: 原来，世事都敌不过时间，喜怒哀乐都是他的手下败将。
usage.eng: Originally, the humans affair cannot stand off the time, the laughter, anger, sorrow and happiness is his defeated general under.
